name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Tablet
description: Lightweight tablet with a 10.1-inch display, 64GB storage, and a 6000mAh battery.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K support, 1TB storage, and a powerful GPU for an immersive gaming experience.

name: Digital Camera
description: Compact digital camera with 20MP resolution, 4K video recording, and a variety of shooting modes.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and long battery life.

name: Smart Home Hub
description: Central hub for smart home devices, with voice control and compatibility with various smart home brands.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes and a pressure sensor.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with high-fidelity sound, 12-hour battery life, and water-resistant design.

name: E-Reader
description: E-reader with a 7-inch glare-free screen, adjustable lighting, and 8GB of storage for thousands of books.

name: Smart Light Bulb
description: Energy-efficient smart light bulb with adjustable color and brightness, controlled via smartphone app.

name: Drone
description: Advanced drone with 4K camera, GPS, and a range of intelligent flight modes for stunning aerial photography.

name: VR Headset
description: Immersive VR headset with 4K resolution, wide field of view, and comfortable design for extended play sessions.

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Smart thermostat with learning capabilities, remote control via smartphone app, and energy-saving features.
